description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5i8a0","text":"This protocol describes the method to perform patch-clamp recordings of iPSC-derived neurons. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working. This protocol was originally provided by Olga Kopach.

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1841i","text":"Patch-clamp recordings of iPSC-derived neurons are performed using an infrared differential interference contrast (DIC) imaging system on an Olympus BX51WI upright microscope (Olympus, Japan) coupled with a Multipatch 700B amplifier under the control of pClamp 10.2 software package (Molecular Devices, USA)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a6bp9","text":"For the recordings, a neuronal culture or co-culture is plated on glass coverslips, placed in a recording chamber mounted on the microscope stage and constantly perfused with a physiological buffer medium. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ir1r","text":"Whole-cell recordings are performed using glass pipettes with a resistance of 3.5-6 MΩ\nwhen filled with the intracellular solution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"duboi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3oaqd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dsthm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":24,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"bv6tp","text":"Perfusion medium (in mM): ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6m59v","text":"126 NaCl, 3 KCl, 2 MgSO4, 2 CaCl2, 26 NaHCO3, 1.25 NaH2PO4, 10 D-glucose ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":41},{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":51},{"key":2,"length":1,"offset":58},{"key":3,"length":1,"offset":80},{"key":4,"length":1,"offset":85}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7n9aq","text":"The medium is continuously bubbled with.    O2 and   CO2\n(  ) and maintained at    -   . ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2tuve","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"concentration":"95","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":14},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"concentration"},"1":{"data":{"concentration":"5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":14},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"concentration"},"2":{"data":{"guid":"","id":0,"number":"7.4"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"ph"},"3":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"30","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"},"4":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"33","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b54d6","text":"Whole-cell recordings are performed using glass pipettes with a resistance of 3.5-6 MΩ when filled with the intracellular solution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kebs","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5hr4a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4g538","text":"Intracellular solution (in mM): ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":64}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"36lin","text":"126 K-gluconate, 4 KCl, 4 MgCl2, 2 BAPTA, 4 Mg-ATP, 0.4 Na-ATP (  , osmolarity\n~295 mOsmol)","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"95ivc","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"","id":0,"number":"7.2"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"ph"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6og72","text":"In the whole-cell (immediately after membrane breakthrough), iPSC-derived neurons are recorded\nfor the resting membrane potential (Vrest), membrane capacitance (Cm), the membrane time constant (τm), and input resistance (Rin)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d56ng","text":"To induce neuronal firing, a series of sub- and supra-threshold rectangular current pulses are applied with a stepwise-increased stimulus intensity at the Vhold set at −60 mV to −70 mV. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28k2t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4jft","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1rhgg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"67qe4","text":"The second protocol tested is a slow-ramp current injection, ramped up with a 100–200 pA/s slope. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"au9ad","text":"The analysis of the AP waveform was performed for the first AP only to quantify the\nthreshold value, the spike amplitude, overshoot, the spike width (duration at\nhalf-maximal amplitude), the rates of depolarisation and re-polarisation phase.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Electrophysiology with iPSC-derived neurons
